sentences.en: a car parked on the other side of the street
sentences.cn: 停在街对面的一辆车

sentences.en: A Wall Street Journal editorial encapsulated the views of many conservatives.
sentences.cn: 《华尔街日报》的一篇社论概述了很多保守派人士的观点。

sentences.en: Bruce Springsteen has re-hired his muso collective, the E Street Band.
sentences.cn: 布鲁斯·斯普林斯汀重新组建了他的音乐团队，E街乐队。

sentences.en: Cool air whooshes up through the grates on the street.
sentences.cn: 冷空气吹得大街上的格栅呜呜作响。

sentences.en: Having children was the quickest way to lose your street cred.
sentences.cn: 生孩子是使自己不再年轻时尚的最快方法。

sentences.en: He has made friends with the kids on the street.
sentences.cn: 他和流浪街头的孩子交上了朋友。

sentences.en: He wanted to go into the street and carve someone's face up.
sentences.cn: 他想上街去把别人的脸刮花。

sentences.en: I let myself out into the street and pulled the door shut.
sentences.cn: 我出门上街并拉上了门。

sentences.en: I walked on further down the street .
sentences.cn: 我继续沿着马路走。

sentences.en: On South Main Street, a huge brick building looms into view.
sentences.cn: 在南大街上，一座巨大的砖砌建筑赫然出现在人们的视线中。

sentences.en: On the far side of the street, two boys were playing marbles.
sentences.cn: 在街道的那一边，两个男孩在玩弹子游戏。

sentences.en: She lives just a few streets away.
sentences.cn: 她的住处就在几条街外。

sentences.en: She loved it, this was just up her street.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢这个，这正中她的意。

sentences.en: She opens her umbrella, and walks up River Street.
sentences.cn: 她撑开伞，沿着河街向前走。

sentences.en: Someone just moved in across the street .
sentences.cn: 街对面有人刚刚搬进来。

sentences.en: The hotel is set plumb in the middle of the high street.
sentences.cn: 宾馆正好坐落在商街的中段。

sentences.en: the restaurant is streets ahead of its local rivals.
sentences.cn: 那家饭店远比当地的竞争对手好得多。

sentences.en: They chased down the stairs into the narrow, dirty street.
sentences.cn: 他们冲下楼梯，来到狭窄、肮脏的街上。

sentences.en: this job would be right up your street.
sentences.cn: 这件工作会非常合你意的。

sentences.en: We moved to Center Street when I was young.
sentences.cn: 在我小时候，我们搬到了中心大街。

sentences.en: Would she know you if she saw you on the street?
sentences.cn: 如果她在大街上看到你，能认出你吗？

sentences.en: You might try the gas station down the street.
sentences.cn: 你可以到街那头的加油站试试。

phrases.tran_cn: adj. 在街上；在交易所打烊后进行的；在户外
(英，非正式)（在能力上）远不能与…相比，比…差得多

phrases.phrase: on the street 或 in the street

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)对…口味的；符合…兴趣的；适合…能力的

trans.tran_en: a public road in a city or town that has houses, shops etc on one or both sides
a public road in a city or town that has houses, shops etc on one or both sides
